pages.text: Created using the $(l:circle_magic/necromancy/necromantic_stone)Rite of Necromancy$(/l), it can be used to control $(item)undead$() monsters raised by a $(l:)Brew of Raising$() or bound ghosts released from a $(l:)Spectral Stone$().

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Point the stone to a target creature or player and the monster under the witch's control will attack the target.$(p)If used on blocks, the controlled monster will move to that location.$(p)The Necromantic Stone is also used to activate and deactivate the $(l:constructs/devices/alluring_skull)Alluring Skull$(/l).
